Ivr4qme.Description: An easy and flexible Auto Attendant solution to define multi-level voice menu, SIP based and available as an optional Queue Manager Enterprise module.
Ivr4qme.Title: IVR module for Queue Manager Enterprise

IvrManagerEnterprise.Description: A simple Auto Attendant with centralized management of basic actions, running on Cisco Voice Gateways as TCL scripts.
IvrManagerEnterprise.Title: IVR Manager Enterprise

LicenseWarning.TitleIvrLicenseInvalid: IVR module license is invalid or expired
LicenseWarning.MessageIvrLicenseInvalid: Both Queue Manager Enterprise license and IVR module license are required. Please, pay attention that no IVR treatment will be applied to incoming calls.
LicenseWarning.TitleQmeLicenseInvalid: Queue Manager Enterprise license is invalid or expired
LicenseWarning.MessageQmeLicenseInvalid: A Queue Manager Enterprise license is required to the IVR module to manage incoming calls. You can still configure existing services and even create new ones but system won't apply any IVR service to incoming calls.

Error.UnableToDeleteService: Unable to delete this service, please try again

Error.UnexpectedResponse: Unable to complete the operation. Please ensure that Queue Manager Enterprise is running.

Title.Menu: Add IVR service from menu template

Empty.Name: From wizard
Empty.Description: With the 3 steps super easy wizard. A default Company closed behaviour will be automatically added.

Menu.Name: From menu template
Menu.Description: A 2 level menu, with the different possible actions, like play messages, transfer calls, repeat menu.

Echo.Name: Echo service
Echo.Description: Diagnostic service for testing DTMF detection.

Tooltip.NameHelp: Enter here a name for this IVR service. This name must be unique.
Tooltip.PhoneNumberHelp: Enter here the IVR pilot phone number used to activate this IVR service. The number must be reachable by the PBX and must be unique (used only by this service).
Tooltip.OverflowHelp: Configure call treatment to apply when licensed channels are exhausted

Error.UnableToCreateService: Unable to create IVR service, please try again
Error.UnableToUpdateService: Unable to update IVR service, please try again
Error.DuplicateServicePhoneNumber: This number is already used in {{voiceServiceType}} {{voiceServiceName}}
Error.InvalidPhoneNumber: This is not a valid phone number
Error.UnableToGetService: Unable to retrieve IVR service settings
Error.UnableToGetIvrServiceTemplate: Unable to retrieve IVR service template
Error.InvalidMenuSectionTimeout: This is not a valid number
Error.MenuSectionTimeoutNotZero: Menu selection timeout must be greater than 0
Error.MenuSectionTimeoutTooLarge: Menu selection timeout is too large. Please enter a number between 1 and {{maxMenuSelectionTimeout}}

Header.Name: Name
Header.Tooltip: To define your IVR service, you can configure as many behaviours as you need, combining them together.

Error.UnableToDeleteBehaviour: Unable to delete this behaviour, please try again
Error.UnableToDeleteBehaviourInUse: This behaviour cannot be deleted because it is scheduled for this IVR service
Error.UnableToDeleteReferredBehaviour: This behaviour cannot be deleted because it is referred by the behaviour '{{referrerBehaviour}}'

Add.Title: Add new {{behaviourType}} behaviour
Add.TypeChoice: Choose which behaviour will be executed

Transfer.Name: Transfer to
Transfer.Description: Transfer call to a specific destination

Menu.Name: Menu
Menu.Description: To define multi-level menu with choices (Press 1 for, 2 for,...)

DialInAndTransfer.Name: Dial in
DialInAndTransfer.Description: Let the caller dial the extension number to be connected to

Tooltip.TransferTo: Specify the number to transfer the call to. Can be a direct extension number or the number of a queue
Tooltip.Retry: Flag to attempt additional call transfers in case of failure (destination number is busy, not reachable or does not answer). You can specify the number of call transfer attempts and relative messages. The no answer timeout can’t be specified here (PBX no answer timeout)

Tooltip.PhoneNumberPrefix: Set the prefix you would like to use when transferring calls to destinations (useful for camp on to extensions)

Error.DuplicationBehaviourName: This name is already used in this IVR service
Error.UnableToCreateBehaviour: Unable to create this behaviour, please try again
Error.UnableToUpdateBehaviour: Unable to update this behaviour, please try again
Error.UnableToGetBehaviors: Unable to retrieve list of service behaviours
Error.UnableToGetDefaultBehavior: Unable to retrieve main behaviour information
Error.MaxRepetitionsNotZero: Max repetitions must be greater than 0
Error.MaxRetriesNotZero: Max retries must be greater than 0
Error.MaxRetriesTooBig: Max repetitions number too big. Please enter a number between 1 and {{maxRetries}}
Error.RequiredMinMaxCollectDigits: Minimum and maximum numbers of digits to be collected are required
Error.RequiredMinCollectDigits: Minimum number of digits to be collected is required
Error.RequiredMaxCollectDigits: Maximum number of digits to be collected is required
Error.MinCollectDigitsNotZero: Minimum number of digits to be collected must be greater than 0
Error.MaxDigitsGreaterThanEqualToMinDigits: Maximum number of digits to be collected must be greater than or equal to the minimum number of digits to be collected
Error.CollectionTimeoutNotZero: Digits collection timeout must be greater than 0 seconds
Error.CollectionTimeoutTooLarge: Digits collection timeout is too large. Please enter a number between 1 and {{maxCollectionTimeoutValue}}

Tooltip.InvalidTimeoutOptionsHelp: These actions apply to the whole menu in case of Timeout or Invalid Selections

ManageService.Title: Manage Service
ManageService.Message:
IVR is a module of Queue Manager Enterprise (QME) sharing the available channels.
To manage the service, please refer to the QME page

ScheduleChooser.Title: Choose schedule type for "{{behaviourName}}"
ScheduleChooser.Description: How do you want to schedule?

WeeklySchedule.Name: Weekly schedule
WeeklySchedule.Description: Schedule this Behaviour as a normal weekly schedule

HolidayOrSpecialEvent.Name: Holiday or special event
HolidayOrSpecialEvent.Description: Schedule this Behaviour as an holiday or special event with an optional recurrence

TimeZone.Description: Select the time zone to be used for this service. The daylight saving setting for the specified time zone will apply. Please, notice that if you change the time zone the existing schedules (weekly calendar, holydays and special events) will be applied accordingly.
TimeZone.Label: Time zone:

DefaultBehaviour.Label: Outside of defined schedules, execute the following behaviour:
DefaultBehaviour.NoBehaviourConfigured: No behaviour has been configured yet. Please, add a new behaviour to define call treatment for this IVR service.

WeeklySchedule.Title: Ordinary Weekly Schedule
WeeklySchedule.Description: Configure here the ordinary weekly opening hours and behaviours of the IVR service. This schedule can be overridden by holidays and special events defined below in the dedicated section.

SpecialEventsSchedule.Title: Holidays and special events
SpecialEventsSchedule.Description: Schedule here behaviour for holidays or special events. These behaviours override the ordinary weekly schedule defined above.
SpecialEventsSchedule.ScheduleBehaviourTitle: Add holiday or special event for '{{name}}'
SpecialEventsSchedule.NoSpecialEventScheduled: No holidays or special events to display

TestScheduledBehaviour.Title: Test a scheduled behaviour
TestScheduledBehaviour.Description: Use this test to see which is the scheduled behaviour for this IVR on the specified date/time.
TestScheduledBehaviour.TimeZoneInfo: The current service time zone ({{timeZoneName}}) is applied
TestScheduledBehaviour.NoBehaviour: This IVR service has no behaviour

Error.Overlap: This behaviour scheduling overlaps with existing weekly schedule
Error.OverlapSpecial: This behaviour scheduling overlaps with an existing special event
Error.UnableToCreateGeneric: Unable to create behaviour scheduling, please try again
Error.UnableToDelete: Unable to delete behaviour scheduling, please try again
Error.UnableToGetScheduledBehaviors: Unable to retrieve time table behaviour scheduling
Error.UnableToUpdateGeneric: Unable to update behaviour scheduling, please try again
Error.WrongTiming: End time must be after start time
Error.UnableToGetScheduledBehaviorAt: Unable to retrieve current behaviour executed

Error.UnableToGetUsers: Unable to retrieve list of users
Error.UnableToDeleteUser: Unable to remove this manager, please try again
Error.AddManagerFailed: * An error has occurred adding manager.

AddManager.Title: Add new managers
AddManager.Description: Use this section to add new manager for the current IVR service
AddManager.SearchTooltip: Type a username, extension or department to search a user.

Home.Rpt_CallVolume_explain: Show number of calls and wait duration per service and per outcome
Home.Rpt_CallVolumeByBehav: Call Volume by Service and Behaviour
Home.Rpt_CallVolumePerBehaviour_explain: Show number of calls and wait duration per service, per behaviour and per outcome
Home.Rpt_BusyChannels_explain: Show busy channels statistics including average and max channel occupation over the day
Home.Rpt_TimePeriodAnalysis_explain: Show the number of calls per outcome and time trend
